title: Disconnect during game
body:
Hello,

During the last days I'm always disconnecting during game, and is not problem from my side. Indeed, several players in my games are disconnecting. What's going wrong RIOT ?

replies.body: There aren't currently any servers issues going on, but if this is happening over and over it's pretty likely that your connection isn't as stable as it seems to be. It's not at all uncommon to be able to reach some servers and not others due to how your network is configured or the status of your ISP and how they're routing your signal to us, but we can take a few steps to figure this out by working through the steps from this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
